OOC:  Krillan said 18 was originally a human, and Dr.
Gero just modified her.  So I guess he didn't get
around to taking away pain.

--- Hollywood Narrator <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: Ah, I see. But if you're using Dragon Ball Z as
> an example, ( I said IF, I am not accusing) in Japan
> they called them "Artificial Human" instead of
> androids. Keeping in mind that the English versions
> are extremely stupid, I wouldn't trust those suckas.
> I myself would classify the characters like 17 and
> 18 of DBZ as cyborgs. King of like in The
> Terminator, except they feel pain where the
> terminator didn't. Geez, man, why did Dr. Gero make
> his machines feel pain? I guess so they can have the
> ability to heal themselves like the Terminator did
> not.
> 
> Just me rambling on...
>
